biotools.summary: BREEZE is a web based interactive application for analyzing drug screening data. BREEZE application combines the comprehensive quality control, dose response fitting and calculates the quantitative scoring parameters such as EC50, IC50, drug sensitivity score (DSS) and area under the curve (AUC). The interactive visualizations generated at each step helps the understanding data and exploratory analysis.
